name: Bull Game ToKens
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: BGT is an integrated world of p2e games and the upcoming metaverse. It aims to create a game network that includes all P2e games to facilitate players and expand the world of profitable games.
